column4: Can anyone point me in the right direction for a working .deb of ZSNES in Intrepid?
32bit is in the repos... there is no 64bit version of zsnes.. alternatively the snes9x emulator works very well also
The 32 bit version in the repos doesn't work.
I had a working deb of it a while ago, but reinstalled and can't find it now.
From what I've gathered from boards and stuff, the version in the repos was compiled wrong or something.
run it from a terminal and look for error messages :() it seems its trying to read a incorrect /dev/ entry  not sure why
looks like its got a BUffer Overflow.. bummer.. nasty bug.  Perhaps the forums, or ppa repos have a newer/fixed version
I had a deb for it that I used for Intrepid, but I just installed Mint 6 and can't find the deb any more.
